sentence.Network_en: Price changes must not adversely affect the living standards of the people.
sentence.Network_cn: 物价变化一定不能给人们的生活水准带来负面影响。

sentence.Network_en: We commented adversely upon the imbecility of that message of telegraphic style.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们对着这条电报式的愚蠢的留言发泄了一通不满.

sentence.Network_en: Widely fluctuating exchange rates may adversely affect international trade.
sentence.Network_cn: 浮动幅度很大的汇率可能会对国际贸易产生有害的影响.

list.abs: 逆商（adversity quotient）全称逆境商数，或叫挫折商，用以预测人的抗挫折能力。它是指人们面对逆境时的反应方式，即面对挫折、 …

收藏查看逆向选择本词条缺少信息栏，补充相关内容使词条更完整，还能快速升级，赶紧来吧！ 所谓“逆向选择”（adverse selection）应该定义为所造成市场资源配置扭曲的现象。经常存在于二手市场、市场。虽然“逆向选择”的含义与信息不对称.

entry.def: Adverse decisions, conditions, or effects are unfavourable to you.

example.ex: The police said Mr Hadfield's decision would have no adverse effect on the progress of the investigation...
example.tran: 警方称哈德菲尔德先生的决定将不会对调查的进展造成不利影响。

example.ex: Despite the adverse conditions, the road was finished in just eight months.
example.tran: 尽管存在种种不利情况，公路还是仅用8个月就完工了。

sentences.sentence: "she was adversely affected by the new regulations"

auth_sentence.content: However those political disagreements have not adversely affected trade.
auth_sentence.res_content: However those political disagreements have not adversely affected trade.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However those political disagreements have not adversely affected trade.

auth_sentence.content: The depression adversely affects the development especially of male infants.
auth_sentence.res_content: The depression adversely affects the development especially of male infants.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The depression adversely affects the development especially of male infants.

auth_sentence.content: The macro-economic slowdown has adversely affected all sectors.
auth_sentence.res_content: The macro-economic slowdown has adversely affected all sectors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The macro-economic slowdown has adversely affected all sectors.

Sentence.sentence: A further expansion of farming area will adversely impact on the world's natural ecosystems.
